note.p: Education: Merchant Taylors' School, London; Trinity College, Cambridge (admitted 1709); Inner Temple (admitted 1710)
Career: Comptroller of Westminster Bridge; died suddenly
P Fontes da Costa, 'The Culture of Curiosity at The Royal Society in the first half of the eighteenth century', NR 2002 vo l56 pp 147-166
Notes: Proposed by Martin Folkes, Oliver St John
